header.name: chaos/preprocessor/recursion/auto_rec.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a binary search used to implement .

macro.abstract: The macro performs a binary search using the predicate specified by its first argument.

usage.param:
The predicate that determines if the search should continue. This predicate must be a macro name that refers to a macro with a signature compatible with the following pseudo-signature:
pred(n)
The size of the group to be searched. Valid values are powers of two from 2 to .

macro.para: This macro expands to the first number in the range of 1 to n for which pred expands to 1. The predicate must expand to 0 for all values preceding this value. Further, the predicate must expand to 1 for all values following this value. In other words, the group must be ordered with all numbers for which the predicate returns 0 preceding all numbers for which the predicate returns 1.
The predicate may not use any macro that employs , nor can the predicate invoke macros that require or perform deduction of the .
